info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 13 at 4:45PM MST until September 13 at 7:00PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: The National Weather Service in Las Vegas has extended the * Flash Flood Warning for... Northern Mohave County in northwestern Arizona... * Until 700 PM MST. * At 445 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms continuing to produce heavy rain around Colorado City and Hildale. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 1.5 inches recently fell north of Hildale. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in Short Creek. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Short Creek and Colorado City. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
